m_szDocSumamry: Union of Concerned Scientists See all press releases > New and Noteworthy Mike Jacobs was quoted in the Huffington Post story about a National Renewable Energy Laboratory study that found the United States could meet nearly 40 percent of its electricity needs from solar alone. The Cape Cod Times quoted Dave Lochbaum supporting calls for Pilgrim Nuclear Power Station to transfer 3,300 radioactive assemblies from its spent fuel pool to dry casks as quickly as possible to make the plant a tougher target for terrorists â€” even if the plant has to draw from its decommissioning trust fund to do so.
